rows.label: qev030601_MSG0040
rows.name: It is you! One who saved us from Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0041
rows.name:
I saw it myself. You fought like fierce valdileo.
I have much respect for you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0042
rows.name:
So you are best one to decide. I cannot ask Liana
because she has too many opinions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0043
rows.name: Heptana or Enneana? Which will be my mate?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_JNK0010
rows.name: Hesitate

rows.label: qev030601_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Nemard if it's really all right for you to decide.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_JNK0020
rows.name: Decline

rows.label: qev030601_SEL0021
rows.name:
Explain that you aren't comfortable
choosing someone else's spouse.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0044
rows.name:
You are brave warrior with keen judgment.
I know you will choose wisely.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0045
rows.name: You are very serious Earth alien.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0046
rows.name:
But I saw you fight. You are worthy of trust.
I accept whoever you choose.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0047
rows.name:
My grandfather is Auld. I want to celebrate marriage
with him, but his remaining days are few.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0048
rows.name: Decision cannot wait. I ask for your help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0049
rows.name:
Good. There are two women I bear feelings for.
You must choose my mate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0050
rows.name:
First is Heptana Logur. She is skilled hunter.
Strong of will and body. Stronger than most men.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0051
rows.name:
She has bright and direct nature.
She would make wonderful mother.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0052
rows.name:
Second is Enneana Spicar. She is talented weaver.
More domestic in nature.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0053
rows.name:
Demure women are rare among Prone.
I find her dear.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0054
rows.name: Both are women to treasure. But you must choose one![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_JNK0030
rows.name: Heptana Logur

rows.label: qev030601_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell Nemard to marry Heptana Logur.

rows.label: qev030601_JNK0040
rows.name: Enneana Spicar

rows.label: qev030601_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Nemard to marry Enneana Spicar.

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0055
rows.name:
So it is Heptana! Ha ha!
Do you prefer strong-willed mate of your own?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0056
rows.name:
She would send even Ganglion running!
I feel most assured at her side.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0057
rows.name: Make no mistake. I would also fight.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0058
rows.name: But good! I will wed Heptana. Will you inform her?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0059
rows.name: She is hunting in West Gate Plain of Primordia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0060
rows.name:
I will also hunt. I must gather items to make horn-ring
of betrothal. This will seal our marriage.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0061
rows.name:
Enneana? Yes. Kind woman is great blessing.
You are most wise![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0062
rows.name:
Enneana will accept me. She is patient.
She will let me show vulnerable side.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0063
rows.name:
...If I had vulnerable side! Which I do not.
I am very manly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0064
rows.name:
Yes. Enneana will be my bride.
Will you inform her of this decision?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0065
rows.name:
She is in starboard area.
She will be weaving.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0066
rows.name:
I will go hunt. I must gather items to make horn-ring
of betrothal. This will seal our marriage.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0070
rows.name:
Ah, [ST:playername ].
Thank you for helping my mate, Heptana.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0071
rows.name:
Our wedding is almost ready. Will you help us?
Do you have time?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0072
rows.name:
This land is unfamiliar. We cannot find some items.
My sister, Duna, is vexed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0073
rows.name: Everyone has been drinking too much. Ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0074
rows.name:
Stop sipping and drink like man, Nemard!
Your wife outdoes you! Are you not ashamed?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0075
rows.name:
I can't get lost in my cups.
Who will carry you home?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0076
rows.name:
Sip is enough if you are by my side.
I need only you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0077
rows.name: Silly man! Do not say such things![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0078
rows.name:
Tsk... *sniff*
You are hopeless, Nemard.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0079
rows.name:
Ha ha! This is day for celebration.
But I fear guests celebrate too much.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0080
rows.name:
Stop sipping and drink like man, Nemard!
Your wife outdoes you! Are you not ashamed?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0081
rows.name:
I can't get lost in my cups.
Who will carry you home?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0082
rows.name:
Sip is enough if you are by my side.
I need only you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0083
rows.name: Silly man! Do not say such things![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0084
rows.name:
Tsk... *sniff*
You are hopeless, Nemard.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0001
rows.name: You return! We have awaited you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0002
rows.name:
Heptana and I are able to marry.
It is thanks to you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0003
rows.name:
Please honor us.
Speak words as we begin rite of marriage.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0004
rows.name:
Please do! I am happy now because you saved me.
I would have died otherwise.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0005
rows.name:
Speeches are hard. We know this.
But please show us path forward.
Show us your wisdom.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0006
rows.name:
Do not overthink it. I have much growing left.
I need only bit of stern guidance![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_JNK0050
rows.name: Lecture

rows.label: qev030601_SEL0051
rows.name:
Tell Nemard to become strong
enough to protect his family.

rows.label: qev030601_JNK0060
rows.name: Praise

rows.label: qev030601_SEL0061
rows.name: Tell Nemard that he is fine just as he is.

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0007
rows.name:
Uncle Galba said same thing.
You are true warrior![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0008
rows.name:
I understand. I will train. I will grow strong.
I will protect Heptana from Ganglion and Cavern Clan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0009
rows.name:
My sister said same thing. Said not to be blinded by
pride and to be kind to Heptana always.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0010
rows.name:
You have my word! I will be strong Prone.
I will accept and support her in all things.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0011
rows.name:
Now, my Heptana!
Accept this horn-ring of betrothal![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0012
rows.name:
You gave me strength to hunt xiphias!
Strength to claim horn![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0013
rows.name:
This is all I can give. I love you, my mate.
I have no more words.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0014
rows.name: Nemard... *sniff* I am so happy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0015
rows.name:
You give love to unwomanly woman.
Thank you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0016
rows.name:
Your happy tears are jewels on face!
You define what true woman can be.
Thank you for having me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0017
rows.name:
We are well and truly wed! Prone stands by one he
grants horn-ring of betrothal until parted by death![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0018
rows.name: Grandfather Auld shed happy tears this day as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0019
rows.name:
Thank you, [ST:playername ].
I will make her happy for all my days.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0088
rows.name:
Ah, [ST:playername ]!
Thank you for helping Enneana.
Sash I received is quite fine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0089
rows.name:
Our wedding is almost ready. Will you help us?
Do you have time?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0090
rows.name:
This land is unfamiliar. We cannot find some items.
My sister, Duna, is vexed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0091
rows.name: Ha ha! Prone men enjoy their drink.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0092
rows.name:
Your cup is untouched, Enneana. You must join us.
Do not play blushing bride. We are family!
Be merry, my mate![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0093
rows.name: No. I must not drink. I am sure to cry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0094
rows.name: No matter. I will dry every tear that falls from your eye.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0095
rows.name:
And not just today! You may cry every day now.
As much as you like. Whenever you choose.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0096
rows.name: Cruel Nemard! I am trying to hold them back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0097
rows.name: I am just...too happy. I cannot... *sniff*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0098
rows.name:
Ha ha! Prone men love their drink!
Bottles empty as fast as they arrive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0099
rows.name:
Your cup is untouched, Enneana. You must join us.
Do not play blushing bride. We are family!
Be merry, my mate![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0100
rows.name: No. I must not drink. I am sure to cry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0101
rows.name: No matter. I will dry every tear that falls from your eye.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0102
rows.name:
And not just today! You may cry every day now.
As much as you like. Whenever you choose.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0103
rows.name: Cruel Nemard! I am trying to hold them back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0104
rows.name: I am just...too happy. I cannot... *sniff*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0020
rows.name: You return! We have awaited you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0021
rows.name:
Enneana and I are able to marry.
It is thanks to you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0022
rows.name:
Please honor us.
Speak words as we begin rite of marriage.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0023
rows.name:
Please do! I am happy because you came to me.
I would have not been happy otherwise.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0024
rows.name:
I know this is true.
So please offer wisdom to guide us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0025
rows.name:
Do not overthink it. I have much growing left.
I need only bit of stern guidance![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_JNK0070
rows.name: Lecture

rows.label: qev030601_SEL0071
rows.name:
Tell Nemard to become strong
enough to protect his family.

rows.label: qev030601_JNK0080
rows.name: Praise

rows.label: qev030601_SEL0081
rows.name: Tell Nemard he is fine just as he is.

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0026
rows.name:
Uncle Galba said same thing.
You are true warrior![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0027
rows.name:
I understand. I will train. I will grow strong.
I will protect Enneana from Ganglion and Cavern Clan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0028
rows.name:
My sister said same thing. Said not to be blinded by
pride and to be kind to Enneana always.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0029
rows.name:
You have my word! I will be strong Prone.
I will accept and support her in all things.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0030
rows.name:
Now, my Enneana!
Accept this horn-ring of betrothal![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0031
rows.name:
You gave me strength to hunt xiphias!
Strength to claim its horn![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0032
rows.name:
I offer it in return for sash you gave me.
I love you more than words can say. Forever![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0033
rows.name:
Nemard... *sniff*
I love you so much! *sob*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0034
rows.name:
To think I can have you at my side... *sniff*
I cannot believe my fortune.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0035
rows.name:
Then I will shower you with love until you believe!
I am persistent. You will believe eventually.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0036
rows.name: Ha ha... *sob* Yes. Nemard, thank you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0037
rows.name:
We are well and truly wed! Prone stands by one he
grants horn-ring of betrothal until parted by death![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0038
rows.name: Grandfather Auld shed happy tears this day as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030601_MSG0039
rows.name:
Thank you, [ST:playername ].
I will make her happy for all my days.[ST:wait ]
